title: Are We All Lemmings and Snowflakes?
description: Welcome to Camp Reset, a summer camp with a difference. A place offering a shot at “normality” for Olive, a girl on the edge, and for the new friends she never expected to make – who each have their own reasons for being there. Luckily Olive has a plan to solve all their problems. But how do you fix the world when you can’t fix yourself?A raw and compelling exploration of mental health, friendship and the power of compassion from the acclaimed Holly Bourne.
author: Holly Bourne
